metadata.title: CVE-2019-16748 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In wolfSSL through 4.1.0, there is a missing sanity check of memory accesses in parsing ASN.1 certificate data while handshaking. Specifically, there is a one-byte heap-based buffer over-read in CheckCertSignature_ex in wolfcrypt/src/asn.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-16748` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 4.2.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.0+dfsg-1').
